steps.title: Download and install 4K YouTube to MP3.
steps.content: Download and install 4K YouTube to MP3. [1] X Research source Though this highly-rated software has YouTube in its name, it can also turn your SoundCloud playlist into an audio file playable on any device that supports MP3s. Click "Get 4K YouTube to MP3" to install the program.

steps.title: Visit your SoundCloud profile.
steps.content: Visit your SoundCloud profile. [2] X Research source Click on your username once to open the menu and select "Profile."

steps.title: Choose a playlist to download.
steps.content: Choose a playlist to download. Follow the "Playlists" link on the menu beneath your profile photo to view your options. Click the name of the playlist to open it in your browser.

steps.title: Copy your playlist address.
steps.content: Copy your playlist address. The address to your playlist will be visible in the your browser’s address bar. Highlight the entire address and press Ctrl + C to copy it to your clipboard.

steps.title: Paste the playlist address into 4K YouTube to MP3.
steps.content: Paste the playlist address into 4K YouTube to MP3. The software makes this task simple with a handy "Paste URL" button. Clicking this button will download the audio files from your playlist and convert them to an MP3 file. The download process may take some time depending on the speed of your computer and internet connection. If you want to change the quality of the MP3 file that 4K YouTube to MP3 creates from your playlist, click the "Preferences" icon and chose your desired bitrate from the Quality menu.

steps.title: Listen to your downloaded SoundCloud playlist.
steps.content: Listen to your downloaded SoundCloud playlist. Click "Play" to open the file in your default music player. You may need to click the file with the right mouse button and choose "Show in Folder" to locate the file.

Download and install 4K YouTube to MP3. 4K YouTube to MP3 makes it simple to convert your playlist to a file that’s playable on any MP3-capable device. Visit https://www.4kdownload.com/download and scroll down to "Download 4K YouTube to MP3". Click the latest Mac OS version to download and run the program.

steps.title: Visit your SoundCloud profile.
steps.content: Visit your SoundCloud profile. Click your username to expand the menu and select "Profile".

steps.title: Choose a playlist to download.
steps.content: Choose a playlist to download. Click the "Playlists" link beneath your profile photo to see a list of your playlists. Open the playlist you wish to download by clicking on its title.

steps.title: Copy the address of your playlist.
steps.content: Copy the address of your playlist. You’ll see the address of your playlist in the address bar at the top of your web browser. To copy it, highlight the entire address and press ⌘ Cmd + C .

steps.title: Paste the playlist address into 4K YouTube to MP3.
steps.content: Paste the playlist address into 4K YouTube to MP3. Open 4K YouTube to MP3 and click the "Paste URL" button. This will download the tracks from your playlist and create a new audio file that you can listen to offline. The time this process takes will vary depending on the speed of your computer and internet connection. If you want to change the quality of the MP3 file created by 4K YouTube to MP3, click the "Preferences" icon and chose a different bitrate from the Quality menu.

steps.title: Listen to your downloaded SoundCloud playlist.
steps.content: Listen to your downloaded SoundCloud playlist. Click "'Play" to open the file in iTunes.

steps.title: Find a playlist you want to download.
steps.content: Find a playlist you want to download. Because they cannot provide a universal way to download playlists, SoundCloud allows artists to link to their downloadable albums or playlists on other sites. You can find out if a playlist can be purchased through another service if an artist has added a Buy button to their playlist. SoundCloud artists do have the option to change the text on the button from “Buy” to something else. Some playlists will say Pre-Order, Purchase, or something along these lines.

steps.title: Download the playlist from the link provided by the artist.
steps.content: Download the playlist from the link provided by the artist. Artists often use services like iTunes, BandCamp or Spotify to sell songs and albums. The link from SoundCloud will likely link to one of those widely-used services, and most will require you to enter your credit card information before you are able to download your playlist.
